sentences.en: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land , ye shall not vex him.
sentences.cn: 33若有外人在你们国中和你同居, 就不可欺负他.

sentences.en: Annoy irritate bother irk vex provoke aggravate peeve rile.
sentences.cn: Annoy使生气,使烦恼,打搅,干扰.

sentences.en: He who peeps through a hole may see what will vex him.
sentences.cn: 从洞中偷看的人会看到令他气恼的事.
她的喋喋不休使我烦恼.

sentences.en: Her silly chatter would vex a saint.
sentences.cn: 她喋喋不休的话会使圣人恼烦.

sentences.en: His silly chatter would vex a saint.
sentences.cn: 他说的话很无聊,多有涵养的人也得气得发火.

sentences.en: His silly chatter would vex you.
sentences.cn: 他那无聊的闲扯会使你烦恼.

sentences.en: I didn't think to vex you by such a trifle.
sentences.cn: 我根本没想用这种小事折磨你.

sentences.en: I didn't vex my mind with the questions.
sentences.cn: 我也不去为这些问题多烦神.

sentences.en: I wouldn't vex my darling, for the wide world's riches.
sentences.cn: 便是把全世界的财富给了我,我也不肯让我的乖乖宝贝生气的.

sentences.en: It is not right to vex ourselves at things, for they care nought about it.
sentences.cn: 因事物而使我们自己烦恼是不对的, 因为它们与你漠不相关.

sentences.en: It vexed me to think of others gossiping behind my back.
sentences.cn: 想到别人在我背后说闲话让我很恼火。

sentences.en: Let us not vex the question.
sentences.cn: 我们不要细论这个问题了.

sentences.en: More than enough am I vex thee still.
sentences.cn: 而多余的我总是要把你纠缠.

sentences.en: That is so vex'd with watching and with tears?
sentences.cn: 看得真呢,它日夜都泪水汪汪?

sentences.en: What troubling wave can arrive to vex A spirit like water in a timeless well?
sentences.cn: 波澜誓不起,妾心井中水.

words.tran_cn: 令人烦恼的；麻烦的；无理纠缠的
生气的，烦恼的，恼怒的；为难的；焦急的
苦恼；恼怒；令人烦恼的事

trans.tran_cn: 〈诗〉使激荡，使汹涌，纷纷议论，长期争论
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel annoyed or worried

trans.tran_cn: 使烦恼，使苦恼，使生气，详细讨论
